com.thomsonreuters.upa.perftools.upajtransportperf

Class TransportSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thomsonreuters.upa.perftools.upajtransportperf.TransportSession

  • public class TransportSession
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores information about an open session on a channel. Handles sending messages for a transport thread.

        Send a burst of messages for one tick.
        Parameters:
        handler - - Transport thread sending messages.
        error - - Gives detailed information about error if any occurred during socket operations.
        Returns:
        negative value in case of error, >=0 if no errors.
